high_descs: Turn around and walk to the coffeetable.
Turn around right and left with the pencil.
Go to the desklamp and touch the pen.

high_descs: Turn left go straight again turn left to the coffeetable.
Take the pencil from the table.
Move the pen near to the desklamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil by the light of a desk lamp

high_descs: going the coffeetable on the bedroom
take in the pencil in the bedroom
pick up the desklamp with the knife on.
